items.value: Ladies and gentlemen! Welcome to a new edition of Out a Live!
We have created various robots that will make live impossible
Destroy the shielded Flying Drone to unlock the door that will take our contestant to the boss room.
Will he get Out a Live? Let the show begin!
The contestant has just arrived at the Zone
let's hope he is well equipped because there is no going back.
The contestant has just arrived at the middle of the Zone.
Let’s see if the contestant is able to break that shield down!
All that’s left is for the contestant to face the ultimate challenge.
A round of applause for our guardian robot.
Let's see how our contestant can deal with it.
Look at that! I have never seen such a determined contestant.
That poor robot is getting quite a beating.
That's it for this edition of Out a Live.
I hope you have a good evening.
Where is this guy going without a weapon? Go get one from the machine
Five turrets destroyed. Where do they get the money for so much junk anyway?
He's fast. He's managed to destroy five kamikaze robots before they blew up in his face.
Our society is recruiting new members. Apply now and get a free cap.
Ten balls destroyed! That's the stuff! I feel identified!
Twenty of our own have fallen!!

items.key: Glory to the superior robot race!

items.value: I don't know… All of this seems fake to me.
Does anyone want to start a pyramid scheme with me?
This is a reminder that the show does not make itself responsible for the contestant's funerary expenses.
Buy show merchandise from our official webpage.
Had they used C++ this would be more bearable.
Did you ever think that we might be false characters in a virtual world?
This one didn't take long… Next one.
Well… Another contestant down… Let's see if the next one does better!
We were growing fond of him
